items.name: quiz
items.title: Quiz
items.description: Multi-type quiz (single-choice, multi-select, true/false) with per-question scoring, progress bar, answer explanations and a pass/fail results screen.

items.name: flashcards
items.title: Flashcards
items.description: CSS 3-D flip-card deck with optional self-rating (Again / Hard / Good / Easy) and a session summary.

items.name: match
items.title: Match
items.description: Click-to-match term/definition pairs with mistake tracking and animated wrong-answer shake.

items.name: fill-blank
items.title: Fill in the Blank
items.description: Inline blank-filling exercise supporting multiple blanks per sentence, alternative accepted answers and keyboard navigation.

items.name: scramble
items.title: Word Scramble
items.description: Letter-tile word unscrambling game with optional image/text clues and a reset button.

items.name: order
items.title: Order / Sequence
items.description: Drag-and-drop (or ↑↓ keyboard) item-sequencing exercise that reveals the correct order on failure.

items.name: reading-passage
items.title: Reading Passage
items.description: Three-phase reading comprehension: passage view → inline questions → results. Supports plain text or HTML and optional passage-hiding.

items.name: progress-tracker
items.title: Progress Tracker
items.description: Gamified zigzag lesson map with XP bar, level badge, daily streak and tooltip-rich lesson nodes.

items.name: spaced-repetition
items.title: Spaced Repetition
items.description: SM-2 algorithm review session: flip cards, grade with Again/Hard/Good/Easy, computes next interval and ease factor.

items.name: hotspot
items.title: Image Hotspot
items.description: Click labelled markers on a diagram or photo, type the answer in a popover, check all labels at once.
